title: 하급 디자이너 S. 이본의 책상
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]

[[include info:start]]
**Original:** [http://www.scpwiki.com/desk-of-junior-designer-s-yvonne Desk of Junior Designer S. Yvonne] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]
**Not Translator:** [[*user XCninety]]
[[include info:end]]

[[image https://i.imgur.com/Th3vdm1.png]]

[[=]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--header-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 3.5);"]]디자인부[[/span]]
[[span style="font-family:var(--mono-font); font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size) * 1.5);"]]아이콘과[[/span]]
[[/=]]

-----
@@@@
@@@@

+++++ 하급 디자이너 __S. 이본,,Yvonne,,__의 책상에서 회수한 자료들:
